name: teasingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you are laughing at someone or saying unkind things about them, either because you are joking or because you want to upset that person: We teasingly called her Betty Spaghetti because she always ordered pasta when we went out to eat. They teasingly gave the boy a hard time because he couldn't say the word "scissors" without whistling.
in a way that causes interest or excitement, especially sexual excitement: She winked at him teasingly from across the room. The band posted some photos on social media that teasingly hinted that a new album was forthcoming.
